trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Data.Entity.Design" /> namespace contains classes to generate Entity Data Model (EDM) files and object source code.
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.Data.Entity.Design" /> contiene le classi per generare i file EDM (Entity Data Model) e il codice sorgente degli oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design> classes support the EDM tools.
trans-unit.target: Le classi <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design> supportano gli strumenti EDM.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the EDM tools, see [ADO.NET Entity Data Model Tools](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/91076853-0881-421b-837a-f582f36be527).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sugli strumenti EDM, vedere [ADO.NET Entity Data Model Tools](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/91076853-0881-421b-837a-f582f36be527).
